spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: Rahadin's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. He can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Deathly Choir
entries: Any creature within 10 feet of Rahadin that isn't protected by a {@spell mind blank} spell hears in its mind the screams of the thousands of people Rahadin has killed. As a bonus action, Rahadin can force all creatures that can hear the screams to make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. Each creature takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Rahadin has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put him to sleep.

trait.name: Mask of the Wild
entries: Rahadin can attempt to hide even when he is only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, and other natural phenomena.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Rahadin attacks three times with his scimitar, or twice with his {@condition poisoned} darts.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Poisoned Dart
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage.
